question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. "new york post" container
B. blue "NYC" sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The blue "NYC" sign is clearly mounted higher up on a pole and positioned further back in the scene compared to the "new york post" container, which is closer to the foreground on the sidewalk.
